headline: Kari Lake’s Latest Campaign Ad For AZ Gov Is So Freaking Badass
sentences: Kari Lake, who used to be a TV anchor and is now running for governor of AZ, released her fist TV ad that she is apparently purposefully airing during what she calls “Corporate News programs.” It’s trolling at its finest.
If the Fake News is hell-bent on lying about the 2020 Election, I’ll force them to air some uncomfortable truths.

pic.twitter.com/1E2wLhqQOS
— Kari Lake for AZ Governor (@KariLake) February 21, 2022
I mean, DAYUM.
I am ONLY airing this video in the middle of Corporate News programs.
She literally calls out fake news right on their own platforms.
They cannot refuse my Ads thanks to FCC rules.
I hope these air during Brian Stelter’s show.
Our FIRST TV Ad dropped today.
